Stack - augmented Parser - Interpreter N.name: SPINN
Stack - augmented Parser - Interpreter N.from sentence: This paper introduces a new model to address both these issues : the Stack - augmented Parser - Interpreter Neural Network , or SPINN , shown in .

SPINN.from sentence: SPINN executes the computations of a tree - structured model in a linearized sequence , and can incorporate a neural network parser that produces the required parse structure on the fly .

test time.from sentence:
This design improves upon the TreeRNN architecture in three ways :
At test time , it can simultaneously parse and interpret unparsed sentences , removing the dependence on an external parser at nearly no additional computational cost .

batched computation.from sentence: Secondly , it supports batched computation for both parsed and unparsed sentences , yielding dramatic speedups over standard TreeRNNs .

novel tree - sequence hybrid architectur.from sentence: Finally , it supports a novel tree - sequence hybrid architecture for handling local linear context in sentence interpretation .
